items.name: PyTorch-Points3d
items.description: A framework for developing and testing common deep learning models to solve tasks related to unstructured 3D spatial data

items.name: PyTorch3D
items.description: PyTorch3D is a library of reusable components for deep learning with 3D data

items.name: RoMa
items.description: RoMa (which stands for Rotation Manipulation) provides differentiable mappings between 3D rotation representations, mappings from Euclidean to rotation space, and various utilities related to rotations.
